testcase.name: Verify if place is being successfully added using AddPlace Api or not
testcase.system-out: Given Add place payload with "Sheetal" "Himachal Pradesh" "Hindi"...........passed When user calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "POST" http request......................passed Then the API call is success with status code 200...........................passed And "status" in the response is "OK"........................................passed And "scope" in the response is "APP"........................................passed And verify Place_Id created maps to "Sheetal" using "GetPlaceAPI"...........passed

testcase.name: Verify if place is being successfully added using AddPlace Api or not 2
testcase.system-out: Given Add place payload with "Mohit" "Punjab" "Punjabi".....................passed When user calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "POST" http request......................passed Then the API call is success with status code 200...........................passed And "status" in the response is "OK"........................................passed And "scope" in the response is "APP"........................................passed And verify Place_Id created maps to "Mohit" using "GetPlaceAPI".............passed

testcase.name: Verify if Delete functionallity is working
testcase.system-out: Given Delete place payload..................................................passed When user calls "DeletePlaceAPI" with "POST" http request...................passed Then the API call is success with status code 200...........................passed And "status" in the response is "OK"........................................passed
